question:
Which of the following Dramas were written by Bhavabhuti?
1) Malatimadhava,
2) Mahaviracharita
3) UttraRamacharita
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Bhavabhuti was an 8th-century scholar of India. He is praised for his plays and poetry which are mostly written in Sanskrit. His plays are considered the equal of the works of Kalidasa. Bhavabhuti wrote three dramas Malatimadhava, Mahaviracharita, and UttraRamacharita.
